name: LiquiShield
description: LiquiShield Safeguard your investments like never before. Our groundbreaking DEX introduces a new era of secure trading, where liquidity is locked upon addition, shielding you from large amount of rugs. Experience the evolution of DeFi with confidence and unyielding protection. Our DEX aims to transform the way people engage with DeFi by providing a secure, transparent, and user-friendly platform for seamless token swapping and liquidity provision. We are dedicated to addressing the prevalent issues of rug pulls and building trust within the DeFi space. Looking ahead, we have exciting plans, including a launchpad for vetted projects, an anti-bot feature, and a solution to prevent contract renouncement rug pulls. Our aim is to empower users, offer lucrative opportunities, and drive innovation in DeFi.
